settings.textHeader:
Every moment at Dozers & Dirt supports the Northern Nevada Children’s Cancer Foundation.
Want in? Enter below for a chance to win a pair of tickets, courtesy of your local Ford Stores.

settings.textMainContent: Join Ford in supporting local families battling childhood cancer. NNCCF relies on funding from you and community events like Dozers & Dirt to give over $8 million to individual families.

settings.infoFirstText: Dozers & Dirt is an annual fundraising event put on in support of the Northern Nevada Children’s Cancer Foundation. The event invites big and little kids alike to operate more than 35 pieces of heavy construction equipment, and experience up-close displays of the RAVEN helicopter, a bomb unit, police cars, fire trucks, and more!
settings.infoSecondText: NNCCF acknowledges that Children’s cancer can be devastating financially and emotionally to children, parents, and siblings. The organization provides support at no cost to families while funding research for safe treatment and cures, and advocating for more federal support for childhood cancer research.
